keyword: how many calories in mcdonalds breakfast burrito
title: How Many Calories in McDonald's Breakfast Burrito?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in McDonald's breakfast burrito, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in McDonald's Breakfast Burrito?
assumptions: Standard Sausage Burrito from McDonald's menu; includes scrambled eggs, pork sausage, cheese, green chilies, onions, and flour tortilla; values based on official data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe updates, portion size, and customizations. Check McDonald's app or website for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One McDonald's breakfast burrito contains about 300 calories and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a McDonald's breakfast burrito?
faqs.a: Approximately 300 kcal for the standard sausage version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in McDonald's breakfast burrito?
faqs.a: About 15 g of protein per burrito.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in McDonald's breakfast burrito?
faqs.a: Around 800 mg, mostly from sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in McDonald's breakfast burrito?
faqs.a: Yes, about 25 g total carbs, mainly from the tortilla.

faqs.q: Does McDonald's breakfast burrito have trans fat?
faqs.a: A small amount, about 0.5 g per burrito.
